OrgName.entry: LAUREN MCCASLIN SCHOOL OF THEATRE DANCE

Desc.entry: Offers a variety of dance and musical theatre classes including; singing & drama, ballet, modern dance, tap and street dance. Sessions suitable for a variety of age ranges from children aged 3 years and over to adult.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 4-4.30pm (Disney dance class aged 3 years and over), 4.30-5pm (baby ballet aged 3 years and over), 5.30-7pm (primary ballet, tap & modern), 7-8pm (senior street dance aged 11 years and over), Wed 4-5.30pm (Grade 2 ballet, tap & modern), Thurs 4-5.30pm (Grade 2 primary ballet, tap & modern), 5.30-7pm (Grade 4 ballet, tap & modern), 8-9pm (senior limbering), Fri 4-5.30pm (Grade 1 ballet, tap & modern), Sat 11.40am-12.10pm (junior limbering aged 5 years and over), 12.10-12.50pm (musical theatre: singing & drama aged 5 years and over), 12.50-1.20pm (junior street dancing aged 5 years and over), 2-3.30pm (preparatory ballet, tap and theatre craft)
